Question
========

*  $\hat \mu_{ML} = -23$, $\hat\mu_{MM} > -23$
*  $\hat \mu_{ML} < -23$, $\hat\mu_{MM} = -23$
*  $\hat \mu_{ML} = -23$, $\hat\mu_{MM} < -23$

Solution
========

Answerlist

*  Отлично
